dose.general: 9-30g decoct for a long period of time

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood, dissolves Phlegm, resolves Stagnation, softens hardness and dissipates nodules

indications: Immobile or mobile abdominal masses involving either Blood Stasis, Stagnant Qi or Phlegm Accumulation
Chronic Stomach pain or Blood Stasis pain such as ulcer pain with vomiting and acid regurgitation (must be calcined)

useCases: Dysmenorrhea due to Qi and Blood Stagnation.
Immobile or mobile masses characterized by accumulation of Qi and Blood or Phlegm.
Hepatomegaly, splenomegaly and tumors of the gastrointestinal tract.

notes: This herb can be used with cancer prescriptions for tumors, swellings, lumps and growths.
This herb is most effective at reducing old Phlegm.
This herb treats intestinal ulcers, hepatosplenomegaly and digestive cancer.
It is said to have a tranquilizing effect.
Calcined Ark Shell Duan Wa Leng Zi is better at absorbing acid and alleviating pain associated with peptic ulcers.
Vinegar-calcined Ark Shell Cu Wa Leng Zi is better able to enter the Blood level, stop the secretion of gastric juices disperse Stasis and abdominal masses and stop pain.
